name: metadata
description: Provides essential information about the event, such as the timestamp, event type, and product details.

children.name: event_timestamp
children.description: The time at which the event occurred. This field is required.

children.name: ingested_timestamp
children.description: The time the event was ingested into the security platform.

children.name: event_type
children.description: The type of event, such as PROCESS_LAUNCH or USER_LOGIN. This determines which other fields are required.

children.name: vendor_name
children.description: The name of the vendor that generated the event (e.g., 'Microsoft').

children.name: product_name
children.description: The name of the product that generated the event (e.g., 'Sysmon').

children.name: product_event_id
children.description: The original event ID from the source product.

children.name: description
children.description: A summary or description of the event.
